      • TrendDistance

        public TrendDistance(P pattern,
                     int n,
                     ca.uqac.lif.cep.Processor beta,
                     ca.uqac.lif.cep.functions.Function delta,
                     R d,
                     ca.uqac.lif.cep.functions.BinaryFunction<R,R,java.lang.Boolean> comp)

        Instantiates a new trend distance processor.

        Parameters:
        pattern - The reference pattern
        n - The width of the window
        beta - The processor that computes the trend on each window
        delta - The distance metric
        d - The maximum distance threshold
        comp - The comparison function between the computed distance and the maximum distance threshold

        Parameters:
        pattern - The reference pattern
        window - A window processor
        delta - The distance metric
        d - The maximum distance threshold
        comp - The comparison function between the computed distance and the maximum distance threshold
